metadata.title: CVE-2020-6480 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in enterprise in Google Chrome prior to83.0.4103.61 allowed a local attacker to bypass navigation restrictions viaUI actions.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
